links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
formula: G.f.: (1-sqrt(1-4*x-8*x^2))/2. - _Michael Somos_, Jun 08 2000Recurrence (for n>3): n*a(n) = 2*(2*n-3)*a(n-1) + 8*(n-3)*a(n-2). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 07 2012a(n) ~ sqrt(3-sqrt(3))*(2+2*sqrt(3))^n/(4*sqrt(Pi)*n^(3/2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 07 2012
author: _Clark Kimberling_
